originalText.text: New Hot Spot Alert üòç I recently discovered this restaurant and I can confidently say that it will be one of my favorite places in Soho. First of all, Odd Sister is dog-friendly. I bring my small Pomeranian for date night. Second, the service was absolutely amazing, very polite and kind people who helped me order the best food. All recommendations are perfect. The food was fresh and cooked well. The restaurant is very cozy with beautiful interior design and I highly recommend this place ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text:
Came across Odd sister by chance walking through Soho and got hungry!
Ambiance: super cute awning upon entering, and was very surprised by how large the space is compared to what it looks like outdoors. Has seating area and then an additional back area with another bar. Very nicely decorated, music playing - not too loud, and light ambient lighting.
Food: ordered the French omelette (was also recommended) which was disappointing, taste fell flat, only nod to taste was caramelized onion stuffed in the middle. The salad had no dressing, and the potato‚Äôs  were okay.
However I did also have the green juice, which was good. And while they were out of the chocolate cake, I did end up getting the cheesecake which came with berries and orange peels which was very delicious.
Overall, want to go back to try some of the dinner dishes to give the food another shot, but overall did like the restaurant!

Overall, want to go back to try some of the dinner dishes to give the food another shot, but overall did like the restaurant!

originalText.text: Amazing food, atmosphere and service!  Highly recommend solo, couple or group. Short rib/ fried rice unbelievable!  Sweet Riesling which I rarely find in an NYC restaurant. We ended the meal with an expresso martini. Simply awesome experience. Thank you Odd Sister for a great experience on a rainy day!

text.text: Amazing food, atmosphere and service!  Highly recommend solo, couple or group. Short rib/ fried rice unbelievable!  Sweet Riesling which I rarely find in an NYC restaurant. We ended the meal with an expresso martini. Simply awesome experience. Thank you Odd Sister for a great experience on a rainy day!

originalText.text: I recently had my engagement party at Odd Sister, and I cannot express enough how amazing it was. The private event space was perfect, and the staff was incredibly professional. The food and drinks were delicious, and the event coordinator, Clodagh, was extremely kind and helpful. Throughout the evening, guests approached me to rave about the venue and ask how I discovered it. They especially loved the fabulous drinks. In fact, many of them returned to Odd Sister the very next day to enjoy the food and declared it their new favorite spot in the city. Odd Sister did an outstanding job hosting such a special and memorable engagement party.

originalText.text:
Obsessed with this place from the food to the vibes. Decor is on point, and the bartender was super attentive. We sat in the back part of the restaurant which has another bar area and some high tops.

The fried rice & spicy tuna on crispy rice were to die for, and we tried a few of the custom cocktails.

Definitely check it out if you‚Äôre near SoHo!
